revised_title: NMR Imaging: Recent Developments and Future Prospects
tldr: This article discusses the recent developments and future prospects of Nuclear Magnetic Resonance (NMR) imaging, which has become a successful clinical tool due to the synergy of science, computer technology, and appropriate magnetic fields. The author provides a brief history of the basic phenomena and special effects that contribute to the interpretation of signals in NMR imaging, highlighting the potential for future advancements in high-resolution spectroscopy and exotic techniques.
